values:
Ok well I have decided that I'm not going to talk to Fuzz unless he texts me or something like that.  And even if he texts me I might not text him back....casue I was thinking about it it is just to weird.  Like he 27 and has a 10 year old son....thats to weird.  But yea I just wanted to say that Im not gonna talk to him for a while.....

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/6479.html

Ok well I talked to Hannah a little today about all this with Fuzz.  She says that its not cool that Im all into Fuzz, cause when I was into Josh she didnt flirt with him when he flirted with her casue she knew that I liked him and she thinks its kinda wrong that I flirt with Fuzz when I know she likes him.  Or at least that is what I got from what she was saying.  But I cant help it.  I flirt with everyone.  Im just a big flirt. And Im such a flirt around Luke's friends.  Like all of them.  I know sometimes it can be wrong but I cant help it.  And I am kinda into Fuzz. I got to talk to him today on the phone :) Its was nice....he can be so sweet.  Like he is really nice to talk to and he nice to me hes not an ass.  I dont know, like I said I dont think I would be all serious with him or anything.  But I dont know.  I think I said this before.....but Im just gonna go with the flow what happens happens and that is that.  So yea but anyways with everything else....not to much is going on with me.  Im kinda lonely right now.  I dont have that many people to talk to.  Like I have Hannah and I love her....but sometimes its nice to have more then one person to talk to.  And sure I have my friends in school...but it seems that they really dont care about some of the stiff I have to say.  Like Kristina and Kirstine care but like when I talk to Amber and Nikki its weird.  I cant explain it. Now Im not talking shit or anything.....its jsut kinda weird talkin to them but whatever I like talking to them.  And I will always be here for them if they need me :)  But yea the weather sucks ass.  Like I cant stand any more rain.  It has been raining all week.  I just want a warm sunny day for once.  PLEASE!!!!!  Is that to much to ask for.  But yea that is about all that is going on with me.  

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/6217.html

Ok well.....I was just texting Fuzz for like 3 hours (again).  But like we were just talking about nothing really...then like I asked him what he was doing and he said that he was sitting at Luke's being cold.  He said that he was curled up in a ball by Luke's little heater.  I said o Im sorry....then he says well its ok cause I get to talk to you.  Awwww....how sweet  then I asked him when he was going to move in with Luke.  He said June sometime.  Then he asked me if I was gonna come see him...I said well I asked Luke if I could come stay with him for a little this summer and he said he didnt know.  Then he was all well I dont think he will mind.  I said well then yep Im gonna come see ya.  OMG.....I really dont know what is going on.  Like Hannah is into Fuzz alot.....and I dont want to be a bitch and be like well now Im into him and shit.  Cause Hannah is like my sis and I dont want to hurt her.  But like I dont know I think that I'm kinda getting into him.  But like there is the whole thing of him being like 26.  WOW that is kinda old.  But like I dont even know........Who knows I think Im just gonna go with the flow ya know but yea that is about all that is new.  But other then that the weather sucks ass.  Its all rainy and icky......everything is glommy.  Its making every one sad...and thats not cool.  But I'm gonna go now cause I have some homework to do.

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/6019.html

Well I really dont know what to talk about.  Im just sitting around.  Well I have no clue what is going on about anything lately.  Like with Josh, Fuzz, or going to cali or anything.  Whatever Im gonna go watch tv...see ya

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/5682.html

Well my weekend was more eventfull then any weekend that I have had in a while but it was a good eventfull.  Well Thursday night I went to Kristina's house with Kirstine and Shawn was there and then at like 6:00 we went bowling.  We saw Amber there and Ashley and Autum.  It was fun.....I was texting Fuzz for a while so that was FUN.  Then we went back to Kristina's house and went to bed.  Kristina and Shawn fell asleep and Kristine and I talked for like and hour or two.  Then we went to go to bed....but I didnt sleep for like 3 or 4 hours casue Kristina's lil brother kept trying to talk to me but I would not answer him.  Like he was really freeking me out.  It was kinda scary.  Then my mom came to get me at like 3:00 and she took me to Hannah's house.  When I got there Hannah, Me and her Mom went into town.  When we got back her mom asked her steepdad if he wanted to go to Banaza?  He said yea so I went to Banaza with them.  That was fun.  Then we went to go some movies.  So we got back to her house and we watched "Thirteen" and "Jeepers Creepers 2".  "Thirteen" was a really good movie.  Then we went to bed and when we woke up we ate and watched a little bit of "Up Town Girls" then she got in the shower and I got in the shower and we went to Luke's house.  When we got there Luke was not there.  Fuzz and his son were.  Man I have no freeking clue what is going on with Fuzz.   Like I have been texting him a lot.......and like all day yesterday just little things that were happening...I dont know.  Like the way we would look at each other and little things he would say to me.  I dont know its kinda crazy.  Like I would never go out with him or anything but I would mess around with him.  But yea....and with Josh I dont really even want to call him anymore.  Cause like why would I want to call someone who hung up on me what is the point of that.  Ya know what I mean.  But I dont know....then Saturday night Hannah and I went to her house to eat and then we went back to Luke's.  When we got there Fuzz was still there.  Like after 5 mins I took him and his son home.  I GOT TO DRIVE :)  But then I went back to Lukes and stayed there with Hannah.  Then we watched "School of Rock".  It was pretty good.  Then we wnent to sleep.  Today Luke went to Jasons grave cause it is his birthday today.  He went with Ben and Cnady.  Then after that he came up to Granny's and we ate up there.  Then Mom Gabby me and Curt came home.  I went to bed till like 8:30 and now I am on here.  But yea that was my weekend. Not very exciting but hey.
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/5387.html

OMG Im so bored.  Today was so boring......I didnt want to go to school but I had to it was gay.  Well tomorrow Im gonna go to Kirstina's house after school then we are gonna go bowling around 9 and then im gonna stay the night at her house.  Then Friday Im gonna go to Hannah's house then Saturday night Im gonna see if I can stay at Luke's house.  I dont know if Im gonna be aloud to thought.  But yea Im watching Blue Crush so im gonna go.
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/5314.html

Well not much new at all.  I tried to call Josh today but he wasnt home.  Im gonna try to call him later tonight....I hope he is home.  I really want to talk to him.  But school was so uneventful today.  It was really gay I didnt want to go.  I just want school to be over.  And I want the summer to come so I can find out if we are going to cali.  But Im gonna go cause Im watching another movie..lol.

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/5034.html

Wow.....Im so bored.  But yea I talked to Josh last night:)  We really didnt talk that long casue Lary told him that he had to get off the phone.  But like I really dont think he is gonna come to DC.  Cause like he said that his cousin is hard to get a hold of.  And his cousion he that one who bought the ticket so I really dont think that he is comming.  But whatever.......Ok well I'm watching a movie so Im gonna go
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/4727.html

Well today was ok......I was pretty happy all day cause I got to talk to Josh last night.  So that made me happy.  But like I called him at like 6:30 and he had a friend there so he asked me to call him back later.  But he isnt home right now so I am gonna try to call later tonight.  I really hope that he is gonna come back here.  OMG I would be so happy if that happened.  I miss him so much and I want to see him so bad!!!!!  But yea anyways.....tomorrow I have to go to this thingy with my pappy.  Its a turkey banquet and I have to work there selling tickets and liek holding pictures that are for sale.  Or something like that.  I'm not quite sure what I'm gonna be doing yet but I get $50 bucks for doing it so hey.  But that is about all I'm gonna do this weekend.  Other then that I'm just gonna sit around and watch movies or something:)  But yea I am gonna go cause I really dont have anything else to say.

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/4517.html

O wow I just got of the phone with Josh :) :) :) :) :) But yea so I asked him if he was going to DC and he said that he prob. was.  I'm gonna call him back tomorrow and see if he is going for sure and when he is comming.  He's so cute man I still love him and sometimes I dont know if that is a good thing or a bad thing but hey I do love him and I can help that so whatever.  But yea I just wanted everyone to know my great news that  I talked to my love but Im gonna eat.

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/4227.html

Josh wasn't home last night so I didn't get to talk to him :'( That makes me really sad cause I wanted to see him if he came back here.  I think he left already cause I tried to call at like 4 their time and he wasn't there.  So I don't even know.  I still dont know have any news about going to cali.  Mom is still talking to Brian and shit and she told me the other day that she was gonna start to look at jobs out there.  So that is a good sign :)  But like I have a pretty good day I found out that my grades are getting a little better.  So that is kinda cool.  But other then that not much happened today.
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/3845.html

Well not to much is new with me there is a lil though.  Like I went to the doctor yesterday to see if he could do anything about the things on my neck. (if ya dont know me then you would have no clue what im talkin about) But he said that I have to get them off cause they could have cancer.  And like he is gonna cut my skin and then fold the skin over and stitch it (I'm guessing).  And he is doing all of this while I'm AWAKE!!!!!!!!! What the hell is up with that.  I really think that he needs to put me to sleep.  I have no clue when all this is gonna happen but I'm so scared :'( Like when he told me that he wasnt gonna but me to sleep I started crying.  Im so scared its not even funny.  But yea I have no clue what is going on with cali.  Like Luke wants to go back and I want to go back more then anything in the world, but Gabby doesnt really want to go and I think mom wants to go.  And my grades here sucks ass and when I was out there they were fine.  And Im not doing anything different then I was out there so I dont understand.  But whatever......I get to talk to Josh tonight.  Well if he's home. Last time I talked to him he said that he might be going to DC for Spring Break and I wanna find out if he is so that I why Im calling him.  Well and just the fact that I want to talk to him.  OMG it makes me so happy that I'm gonna get to talk to him :) But yea that is about all that is new with me.  This weekend kinda sucked ass.  I sat on my ass the whole weekend.  Like I had fun at Lukes and everything it was just a lil boring.  But yea that is about it.

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/3611.html

Well things are much better then they were yesterday.  Brain e-mailed mom.......so they are cool (I hope).  So my hopes are back up now about going back to cali.  And like I kinda dont want to live with Brain but hey I kinda do.  Like sure him and I had our bad times but there were good ones too.  But yea Im still waiting to get my phone so I can talk to Josh.  Im going to Lukes tomorrow so maybe I will use his phone to call him.  Cause he has to DJ so Im gonna be by myself just sitting there watchin TV.  So when would be a better time to talk to Josh.  OMG I really hope that he comes here for Spring Break.  He said that he might be going to DC and if he goes I am makin him come up here and see me :) :) :) That will be FUN!!!!!!!!  But yea Im gonna go cause I have to finish some homework...yea 

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/3076.html

I tellin ya if my mom does not move me out to cali next year I am gonna flip.  I need to be out there. I want to be with Josh so bad.  I love him so much I dont know what Im gonna do if I cant go out there next year.  She (my mom) better get her butt in gear.  But yea today was so boring....I had to do that PSSA shit.  It was gay.  But whatever I want to talk to Josh :( But I dont have a phone cause my mom didnt pay the fucking bill.  How much worse can my life get at once.  It could be worse, but it is pretty bad.  Like I cant be with the guy I love cause he is on the other side of the country and I cant talk to him cause I dont have a phone.  I cant talk to anyone.  OMG OMG OMG I am just gonna pray that mom will move us back out to cali next year.  I get to go to my bro's this weekend.  So maybe that will get my mood up a little.
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/2936.html

OMG OMG OMG........yesterday I got my AIM at like 7 and Tara was on and I asked her what Josh said about the letter I wrote him and she said that he just wanted me to call him.  So last night I called him and we were talking for like and hour and a half.  It was so wonderfull.  Like he told me that he missed me and that he wanted me to come back out there.  Awwwww.....I miss him so much.  But he said that he might be comming to DC for spring break and if he does Im gonna make him come up here and see me.  :)  But yea I didnt go to school today casue Im a little sick.  So Im gonna have to make up the damn PSSA things.  They suck I really dont like them.  Anyways that is about it so...
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/2572.html
OMG my mom talked to Brian the other day and he told her that he wanted her to come back out to cali.  OMG OMG OMG OMG....that is great.  But yea that is all I wanted to say but I got to go..
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/2336.html

Omg....I miss Cali so much :(  I dont even know where this all came from.  Like I just miss everyone.  I dont know it just seems that it will never be the same as it was.  I miss things the way they were. I always had someone at my house and I was never alone, I was always doing something.  I  almost never sat on my ass.  I always had someone to talk to.  And I really dont have that here.  Yea I have friends here but like I cant hang out with them cause I have no way to get anywhere. And I cant go do anything cause I have no money.  Everyone just goes to partys around here.  Sure people out there go to partys but since I dont drink or anything we would always find something that we all had fun doing.  Even if we went out walking, not really knowing where we were going.  Here I cant do that.  All anyone ever does here is go to partys :( so that leaves me here by myself.  So yea you herd me complain...so im gonna go now....

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/2108.html

OMG......I hope we dont have school tomorrow.  I really dont wanna go.  I just want to sit at home and be lazy.  School is so gay.  But yea anyways not much is new.  Its kinda crazy I dont talk to Ben at all.  Like Im sure if like I was at Lukes and he went up there he would talk to me. But we do not talk in school at all.  Its weird....but whatever.  And Josh has not written back yet.  It still bugs me but not as much as it did.  Like I still really wanna know what he is gonna say, but there is nothing I can do about it.  So I will just have to wait.  But Im gonna go eat cause Im hungry. 

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/1994.html

Wow I  woke up at like 5 this morning and got in the shower then when I got out I went to wake up my little sister and my mom said Carlie there is a 2 hour delay.  I was so happy....so I went back to bed.  It took me a while to get back to sleep but I did.  I didnt want to even come to school today so it jsut made it better that we had a delay.  OMG this weekend is gonna be so boring...I want to go to Luke's house but I really dont think that is goona happen cause he has to DJ (I think).  And there is no where for me to sleep..yet.  I wanna go so bad though cause I really dont want to just sit at my house.  There is not gonna be a damn thing for me to do at my house. Everyone wants to go to cali with me this summer. Its crazy.....but it would be so much fun if I went with alot of people.  Like I know Ashley wants to go and Nikki just told me today that she wants to go, and Hannah wants to go.  But like that is not gonna work casue Ashley and Nikki dont really get alone. But hey if they both still wanna come its cool with me.  I think we should just get like 2 cars and drive out there.  We would have to get money though. I dont think that would be to hard but hey.  I have to start saving my money.  I want to get enough to go to Redondo's prom next year.  So I have to save enough to get the plane ticket and a dress and to get my nails done and my hair.  That alot of money, but I think I can do it.  Like I really want to go and I would get to go to prom with Tara and Jakcie and everyone.....so hey.  i dont even know if I want to go to prom here.  Like I wanna go really bad. But I want a date and like I have no idea who I could go with.  Hummmmmmmm....there is always Ben.  But Im not gonna ask him....I dont ask guys to dances.  And its prom the guy has to ask the girl.  Thats the way it work.  So I guess we will see.  I will end up going even if I dont have a date watch.  But Im not gonna go if none of my firends go.  But Im sure they will.  Cause it would be fun.  I just want to go cause I wanna get a pretty dress and get my nails done and girl stuff. God I hate study halls they are so boring.  Like I never have anything to do.  If some of my firends were in here it would be different.  But no they all have some class.  But Im gonna go cause class is almost over.  

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/1668.html

Wow today was so not fun.  It started snowing and just ewwww.  I really dont like the snow.  Its to damn cold.  But o well I guess I will just have to live with it.  You know that its like 80 in cali right now.  I could be at the beach if I wanted to.  But its ok....I would miss some of the people here a lot if I left.  But yea other then that nothing really happened today.  I was gonna go to my chior concert but that didnt happen cause the roads were to bad.  My moms car is from cali and it sucks driving in the snow so she did not want to drive anywhere.  So I didnt get to go to that.  And I didnt get to talk to Tara to see if Josh has said anything back about the letter that I wrote him.  God it is driving me crazy.  I wanna know what he is gonna say.  Even if it is bad I still wanna know like really really bad.  I really should stop liking him.  It kinda bugs me that I still love him.  But hey I will just have to live with it, till I find someone new to love.  That really does not seem to be happening though. I even tried to like other people and they just decided to be assholes.  God.....Im tellin ya.  I have such bad luck when it comes to guys.  I cant seem to make it work.  I hate it but whatever.  I guess I will just have to wait till its time for me to find someone that is gonna love me back.  But yea Im watchin Speed so I'm gonna go....

~Carlie~
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/1331.html

Wow today was so uneventfull.  I was so bored in school.  I got to see Ben though. :)  I dont know what to do about him.  I think that he kinda likes me to but like Im so scared that Im gonna fuck things up again.  All the guys that I have liked or been with, things get fucked up.  And I dont want that to happen agian.  I want to have a relationship with someone and make it work.  I have such bad luck with guys :(  Like I wanna call him but like I dont know.  I might be going over around where he lives to stay for a little while so who knows maybe something will happen.  I dont think it will but hey who knows.  It fells and sounds like I like a different guy everyday.  But that is not how it is at all.  I dont wanna sound like a slut or anything I just cant seem to find a nice guy.  Its rally gay if you ask me.  But what would my life be without guys :)
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/1233.html

Ok well things are better then they were.  I went to the dance last night with Ashley it was pretty fun.  The best part was dancing with Ben :)He is pretty hott. So yea that was fun.  Then after the dance mu mom came and picked up me, Hannah and Ashley.  We took Hannah and Ashley home and then we to Luke's house.  When we got there only Luke and his date Erica were there.  But we were getting ready to leave and Fuzz, Chad, and Mike pulled in.  So we stayed.  We were there for about 3 hours.  It was pretty cool cause I love being at Luke's house.  I was jsut talkin to Chad and Fuzz all night.  They are so cute. But I got to drive home casue my mom was to fucked up to dive so that was fun. Fuzz has been callin me lately.  Its kinda funny lol.  But hey its cool with me. I just sittin around all the time so hey I could use someone to talk to lol.  But yea so not to much has happened.  I wrote Josh the letter, and told him that I will always love him and shit.  But hey its the truth so.  Im still waiting for him to write back.  He said he would so I guess we will see.
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/880.html

Ok well today I just realized that I still kinda like my ex Josh.  I miss him so much and sometimes I just wish that I could be with him again.  No one would understand this eaither cause what he did when we broke up was pretty bad but I want to forgive him and if I had the chance to be with him again I would in a heartbeat.  I jsut wish that there was someone that understood how I feel..........
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/582.html

So yea Im just sitting here in study hall thinking about everything that has been going on lately.  Like I cant decide if I want to go back to cali or stay here.  I think Im kinda leaning towards cali right now cause no one here is giving me any reason to stay.  Like sure I have friends here but I dont know it is just not the same as it was.  the people here do not understand what is going on with me at all.  Well Ashley understands but no one else really does.  And I cant do anything here cause I live in the middle of nowhere and no one likes to drive out there and my mom doesnt like to drive anywhere.  Its really gay.....I hate living out there.  I cant even walk anywhere.  Well I could walk but I would not get anywhere.  I miss the city so much.  Well not really the city just being able to walk out the front door and go somewhere. I just wish that things could go right for once in my life.  Like I want the life back that I had in cali.  Where I saw my boyfriend everyday (out of school) and I had friends at my house all the time.  And if we were not at my house we were somewhere else.  But I was always with someone.  I was not alone all the time.  Now Im always alone......I dont get to see my boyfriend and I dont get to chill with my firends.  God I hate it.  Now sure you might read this and say o she needs to stop pitying her self(like my friend hannah).  Well if you want to look at it that way then dont read it.  And if I happen to be talking to you and all this starts to come out dont listen.  Cause Im not trying to sound like Im pitying myself Im just trying to get all this shit out.  So its not all bottled up inside anymore.  I can remember when Hannah said that to me...I kinda hurt me cause that is what a friend is for to listen when you need to talk or vent, and that is all that im doing.  But yea that is about all that I'm thinking about right now so.....
http://anglgyrl87.livejournal.com/366.html
